items.title: Bakkt shares jump 40%+ after naming Mike Alfred, the crypto veteran who co-founded Digital Assets Data, to its board (RT Watson/The Block)
items.summary:
RT Watson / The Block:
Bakkt shares jump 40%+ after naming Mike Alfred, the crypto veteran who co-founded Digital Assets Data, to its board  —  - Alfred co-founded Digital Assets Data, which New York Digital Investment Group acquired in 2020.  — He also serves on Bitcoin miner Iren's board of directors.

items.title: What Early-Stage Investors Really Look for in Founders at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: At TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, Charles Hudson (Precursor Ventures) and Wesley Chan (FPV Ventures) break down what early-stage investors really look for in founders — from narrative and resilience to red flags and common mistakes. Don’t miss this candid Builders Stage conversation. Register by September 26 at 11:59 p.m. PT to save up to $668.

If you want to affordably add a couple of MagSafe mounts to one car or divvy a couple up between two vehicles, this is a solid time to cash in. You’re looking at just $4 a pop, which is about as good as it gets. These attach to vents and shouldn’t take long to get locked in place.

Alongside the ongoing $300 price drops on the Galaxy Z Fold 7, we have now collected all of Monday afternoon’s most notable deals surfacing on Google Play. We also have an ongoing all-time low on Google’s new Moonstone Pixel Buds Pro 2, a $400 price drop on the 2025 Razr Ultra flip phone, and the unlocked  S25 Edge at $400 off via Amazon. But for now it’s all about the apps and you’ll find them all waiting for you down below.

items.title: Haul it all in tomtoc’s spacious 40-liter 17.3-inch laptop travel backpack down at $70 (Save 20%)
items.summary:
tomtoc 40L 17.3-inch Laptop Travel Backpack

Buy for $70 (Reg. $88)

What we love

I made the switch to a bag like this earlier this year. I wanted to only haul one bag when I board a flight and this spacious bag can certainly help you do that. Much like the one I’m using, it sports a duffle bag style side opening so you can fill it like you would luggage. Around back you’ll find a slot for an up to 17.3-inch laptop as well, ensuring it can handle just about anything out there.

items.title: A ‘global call for AI red lines’ sounds the alarm about the lack of international AI policy
items.summary: On Monday, more than 200 former heads of state, diplomats, Nobel laureates, AI leaders, scientists, and others all agreed on one thing: There should be an international agreement on “red lines” that AI should never cross — for instance, not allowing AI to impersonate a human being or self-replicate.  They, along with more than 70 organizations […]

items.title: Don’t need a standing desk? This standard model delivers integrated lighting and AC outlets at $86 (Save 31%)
items.summary:
YITAHOME L-Shaped Desk with Power Station and LEDs

Buy for $86 (Reg. $124)

What we love

While we cover a lot of standing desk markdowns, some folks would rather stick with a traditional solution and we totally get that. This offering delivers loads of space with an L-shaped form factor that comfortably accomodate a few monitors. A couple of other notable perks include integrated LEDs and a power strip for quick access to AC outlets and a USB port.

items.title: This Anker Prime 200W 6-port USB-C charging station will power your desk setup for $56 today
items.summary:
Courtesy of Anker’s official Amazon storefront, you can score the brand’s Prime 200W 6-port USB-C charging station for $55.99 shipped. This multi-port charger typically goes for $80, so you’re looking at a 30% discount that takes $24 off its usual going rate. Today’s deal matches the lowest price we first tracked for this model as a Prime-exclusive offer shortly after its debut. More recently, it hit that price during the previous Prime Day sale, and it’s now back again at that same all-time low. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Apple’s 1-meter 25W MagSafe charger just hit the best Amazon price of the year at $28
items.summary:
Apple somewhat quietly released a new 2025 MagSafe Charger last week. It is effectively the same thing as the 2024 model, just with official support for Qi2 – so it can deliver up to 25W of juice to more than just iPhone 16 and 17 devices. The new model comes in two sizes: 1-meter for $39 and the 2-meter model that is currently already on sale at just over $34. However, Amazon has dropped the 25W 2024 model Apple MagSafe Charger down its best price of the year at $27.90 with free shipping for Prime members  or in orders over $35. 

more…

items.summary:
There are a ton of great deals on power adapters from third-party brands, we post them all the time. But if you’re the type to lean into your first-party Apple charging gear, Amazon is offering its best price yet on the official Apple 30W USB-C Power Adapter down at $25 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35 – that’s 36% off the original $39 list price. Head below for more details and a closer look at some other discounts on official Apple chargers at Amazon.

items.title: Craft the best looking closet in the house with five of these stackable baskets down at $7 each
items.summary:
caktraie Stackable Closet Baskets (5-pack)

Buy for $36 (Reg. $40)

What we love

A few years back I took the time to install shelving in my closet and get a system in place for where everything goes so it can always look tidy. It’s a move I have yet to regret, and now I’m considering adding some of these shelves as well. With them you can easily move things around when the seasons change and keep everything looking incredibly organized. I love the stackable nature of these too.

items.title: HP’s OmniBook 5 2K OLED Snapdragon X Plus Copilot+ laptop is back to its lowest price at $550
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Best Buy that drops HP’s latest OmniBook 5 Snapdragon Copilot+ PC down to $549.99 shipped. You are looking at a fairly new laptop that hit the scene earlier this year in June carrying a $700 price tag. This base variant of the OmniBook 5 with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD dropped to $550 for the first time last month, and it’s back again today with a $150 discount. It’s a good option for folks looking to buy a simple, everyday laptop for school or work, and you can learn more about it below.

more…

items.title: Amazon drops Jackery’s HomePower 3000 LiFePO4 station to a new $1,299 low (Reg. $2,499), bundles start from $1,499
items.summary:
Update 9/22: Jackery has dropped the price lower than ever on its HomePower 3000 station and bundles starting from a new $1,299 all-time low. Prices have been adjusted below.

By way of its official Amazon storefront, Jackery has dropped its new HomePower 3000 Portable Power Station down to its lowest rate of $1,499 shipped, which has several discounted bundle options (listed below the fold) and is matching the price we’re currently seeing from the brand’s direct website. This new backup power solution has only been on the market since May, normally carrying a $2,499 full price tag, which we’ve mostly seen drop down between $1,899 and $1,699, though recently it’s fallen to $1,599 on Amazon and the $1,499 low during the most recent direct sale. Now that low price is sliding over to Amazon for the first time, giving you $1,000 off the going rate. You can also find the launch deals on the brand’s new HomePower 3600 Plus station and bundles starting from $1,699 through September 21.

more…

items.title: JPN Offering Free MyKad Chip Replacement Ahead Of BUDI95 Subsidy Rollout
items.summary:
The Ministry of Home Affairs (KDN) and the National Registration Department (JPN) will provide free replacement of damaged MyKad chips nationwide from 23 September to 7 October 2025. The programme is introduced in conjunction with the launch of the Budi Madani RON95 (BUDI95) initiative, which will allow eligible Malaysians to purchase petrol at RM1.99 per […]

The post JPN Offering Free MyKad Chip Replacement Ahead Of BUDI95 Subsidy Rollout appeared first on Lowyat.NET.

items.title: MyKad chip faulty? JPN offers free replacement from 23 Sept to 7 October
items.summary: In conjunction with the recent BUDI95 initiative which offers Malaysians cheaper subsidised RON95 fuel price of RM1.99/litre, the National Registration Department (JPN) has announced that it is offering free MyKad replacement for faulty chip starting tomorrow, 23rd September until 7th October 2025. Malaysians are required to have a functioning MyKad and a valid driver’s licence […]
